column4: I keep getting this when I try to move/copy a file (like mp3 or .jpg) from Ubuntu over to my mounted sata drive: "Error "I/O error" while moving "/home/bobb...p/cube.jpg" dialog warning box.. what is wrong ???
Ok it is gone, it unmounted
I got the same I/O error now after remounting  when trying to move files :(
maybe you need to fsck that partition
lol how do I use fsck to scan my mounted /dev/sda1 ?
fsck 1.39 (29-May-2006)| fsck: fsck.ntfs-3g: not found | fsck: Error 2 while executing fsck.ntfs-3g for /dev/sda1
you might need to boot with a windows cd and use its system recovery dealy to run chkdsk
